personal.name: MEENAKSHI OJHA
personal.title: Software Development Engineer 3 | Senior Frontend Developer | Scrum Master

summary.base: Experienced Frontend Developer and Scrum Master with 5 years of expertise in React, Redux, and microfrontend architectures. Proven track record in delivering high-impact banking applications with strong focus on quality standards, test-driven development (TDD), and Agile methodologies.
achievements: Built scalable frontend applications serving thousands of users with 99%+ uptime
Increased development efficiency by 40% through reusable component architecture
Improved code quality metrics: 75% test coverage, 50% reduction in bugs through comprehensive testing
Successfully mentored 5+ junior engineers in React.js and frontend best practices
Led technical design and implementation of multiple large-scale frontend projects

experience.title: Software Development Engineer 3 | Senior Software Development Engineer 1 | Scrum Master

items: Led technical design and implementation of multiple large-scale frontend projects from conception to production deployment
Built high-performing client code using React.js, TypeScript, and modern JavaScript (ES6+) serving 10,000+ concurrent users
Drove strong collaboration with product managers, UX designers, and backend engineers to understand user pain points and deliver optimal solutions
Implemented comprehensive testing strategy using Jest, Enzyme, and React Testing Library, achieving 80%+ code coverage
Contributed to rigorous code reviews and maintained technical documentation for 20+ team members
Took on complex bug fixes and performance optimizations, reducing application load time by 40%
Developed scalable component architecture with 20+ reusable React components, improving development velocity across teams
Implemented modern frontend ecosystem tools including Webpack bundling, ESLint configuration, and automated testing pipelines
Served as Scrum Master facilitating sprint planning, daily standups, sprint reviews, and retrospectives for cross-functional team
Onboarded and mentored 5+ junior engineers in React.js, JavaScript best practices, and frontend architecture patterns
Led Agile software development practices resulting in 25% improvement in sprint velocity and delivery predictability
Engineered microfrontend solutions using Yarn workspaces, improving code maintainability and enabling independent team deployments
Built frontend applications at scale with focus on performance, accessibility, and cross-browser compatibility
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with automated testing, linting, and deployment processes

projects.name: Digital Banking System – Community Frontend
description: Built and maintained a social banking community platform with real-time features and complex state management
Implemented user engagement features that boosted platform satisfaction metrics
Developed responsive UI components ensuring cross-browser compatibility
Integrated with backend APIs using Redux-Thunk for seamless data flow

projects.name: React Component Library
description: Developed 20+ configurable and reusable components for the product portfolio
Utilized Storybook for component documentation and stakeholder communication
Enhanced design consistency and development efficiency across multiple applications
Implemented automated testing and documentation for component library

projects.name: Banking Onboarding Application Frontend
description: Led frontend development of comprehensive banking onboarding application
Ensured seamless integration with backend services through Redux-Thunk
Implemented form validation and multi-step user flows
Optimized user experience resulting in improved conversion rates

projects.name: Daily Banking Microfrontend Application
description: Developed microfrontend project using Yarn workspaces architecture
Created JSON-driven screens using adapters providing 80% client configurability
Reskinned application screens using Figma designs, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Enhanced UI/UX resulting in increased user engagement and satisfaction

projects.name: Banking Backoffice Management System
description: Developed administrative interface for banking operations management
Implemented complex data tables and filtering systems
Created audit logging and reporting features
Ensured high performance with large datasets
